price: Ka ce: "Ku kirãyi waɗanda kuka riya, baicinSa." To, ba su mallakar kuranyẽwar cũta daga gare ku, kuma haka jũyarwa."*
arabic: قُلِ ٱدۡعُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ زَعَمۡتُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ فَلَا يَمۡلِكُونَ كَشۡفَ ٱلضُّرِّ عَنكُمۡ وَلَا تَحۡوِيلًا
footnotes: * Bã zã su iya jũyar da cũta daga gare ku zuwa ga wani ko kuwa daga wani zuwa gare ku ba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: quli id'ʿū alladhīna zaʿamtum min dūnihi falā yamlikūna kashfa al-ḍuri ʿankum walā taḥwīlan
